item.title: Stranger in Paradise
item.author: ssphugo@srkn.anonaddy.com (Srikanth Perinkulam)
item.description:
Back in 1911, a box with a dead raccoon in it showed up in Washington D.C., at the office of Gerrit S. Miller. After pulling it out and inspecting it, he realized this raccoon was from the Caribbean islands of Guadeloupe, and unlike anything heâ€™d ever seen before.

Source: Stranger in Paradise

item.title: Week7Day4
item.author: ssphugo@srkn.anonaddy.com (Srikanth Perinkulam)
item.description:
A good 8mile run from the yoga studio to home. Clocked about 01:25.

As I was waiting at a signal near BWH a fellow runner who looked pretty shaken asked if she could tag along for a few blocks. Apparently some random guy on the road pushed her on to the wall and tried molesting her…Disgusting! The roads were pretty well lit AND there were quite a few folks out there. Appalling that one has to be always on guard in Boston too.

item.title: You've got trail!
item.author: ssphugo@srkn.anonaddy.com (Srikanth Perinkulam)
item.description: 150 Years!! The Canada park service is giving out passes all through 2017 for free entry to parks they govern. I guess it’s free for anyone visiting so technically their gates are open. But think of the number of folks they’d draw in and the awesome culture being subtly promoted..Awesomeness!
